recipe_name: Sweet and sour pork served on chard leaves
author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Heat the oil in a large frying pan. Add the pork and fry for three minutes on each side, until browned. Add the prunes, leek, Tabasco sauce, tomato sauce and soy sauce and cook for a further five minutes. Add the honey, orange segments and coriander and cook for a further two minutes. To serve, lay the chard leaves flat on the plate and top with the sweet and sour pork.
